title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added `shouldLogException` utility to ignore ECONNRESET and "TypeError: terminated" errors.
Refactored error handling middleware to use the new utility and added comprehensive tests.
Updated OpenAPI schemas (REST/webhooks) with new parameters (`size`, `image_id`) and structural fixes.
Revised GitHub Packages event descriptions and bypass ruleset documentation.
Updated configuration SHAs across multiple files.

This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary  
- Added `shouldLogException` utility to ignore ECONNRESET and "TypeError: terminated" errors.  
- Refactored error handling middleware to use the new utility and added comprehensive tests.  
- Updated OpenAPI schemas (REST/webhooks) with new parameters (`size`, `image_id`) and structural fixes.  
- Revised GitHub Packages event descriptions and bypass ruleset documentation.  
- Updated configuration SHAs across multiple files.  

### Title  
Add error filtering for network errors and update OpenAPI schemas
